judges: Before Jones, O. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Superior Court and the judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Graham Sale, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with him John J. Dewn, Assistant Public Defender, and George H. Ross, Public Defender, for appellant.
J. Kent Gulley, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Sherrell, Appellant.
Argued September 25, 1972.
Before Jones, O. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
J. Graham Sale, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with him John J. Dewn, Assistant Public Defender, and George H. Ross, Public Defender, for appellant.
J. Kent Gulley, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 2, 1973:
